**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 [Hateful Hermit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2231) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 74 **Perception** +11 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +4 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66) (10 darts), [Graveroot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=116) (4 doses), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), _+1 [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ --- **AC** 21 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +11 **Will** +9 +2 status to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects **HP** 80 **Resistances** [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 5 --- **Speed** 25 feet; trackless step **Melee** _whip_ +14 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d4+7 slashing **Melee** sickle +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d4+7 slashing **Ranged** blowgun +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1 piercing plus graveroot **Focus Hatred** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The hateful hermit unleashes a vexing stream of profanities and threats at a single foe he can see within 30 feet. The hermit gains a +1 circumstance bonus on all attack rolls made against that target until he chooses a different target to Focus Hatred on. The target must attempt a DC 22 Will save, with the below effects. The hateful hermit cannot Focus Hatred again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Focus Hatred for 24 hours.
**Success** The target is distracted by the hatred and is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the hermit's next attack.
**Failure** The hermit's words unnerve the target and distract them; the target is flat-footed until the end of the hateful hermit's next turn.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the target is flat-footed for 1 minute. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The hateful hermit deals 2d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Trackless Step** The hateful hermit always gains the benefits of [Cover Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65) in natural surroundings, even when moving at full speed.
name: Hateful Hermit
